website_summaries.verdict: A strong basket that stays securely shut in the wash. Quality is not compromised despite the low cost.
pros: The durable rubber coating holds up well in the dishwasher
The basket lid attaches securely and will not open inside the dishwasher
Basket is small enough to fit on most top racks
The basket successfully holds utensils too tall to stand up and prevents them from falling to the bottom
Basket sits at a low price point
cons: Slots in basket are on the large side, not ideal for extra small items

customer_reviews.title: Rusted After Six Months
customer_reviews.text: I've had the White Dishwasher Basket by Better Houseware for six months. At first, I thought it was just what I needed - it's small enough to fit on my dishwasher top shelf, but large enough to hold several reusable K-cups and cat food lids. However, it is now rusting and nasty. See the photos. I can't keep using this items and will have to find something better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Good for Real Small Items
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this dishwasher basket. I purchased it so I could wash my little plastic measuring spoons, some plastic beverage bottle caps, a gadget I use to score the thick skin or peel of fruits, like oranges and avocados, (this gadget is the size of a ring someone would wear), and any other very small items that need washing. Unfortunately, the gaps between the metal grid are way too large, and everything slips through to the bottom of the dishwasher! This basket is great for larger "small" items, like a baby bottle ring or other kitchen gadgets that aren't really small and/or thin and/or short.
customer_reviews.author: mhorris46

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cleaning Small Items in the Dishwasher !
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small "Dishwasher Safe" basket to wash nebulizer parts. This basket does the job. It is a sturdy metal basket covered in soft plastic, and the clasp action is adjustable by a slight bending of the clasp. Almost any small items can be placed in the dishwasher for cleaning with this basket. The wires are about 1/2 inch apart and coated in a soft plastic to prevent damage to the item being cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: V. O. Ritter

customer_reviews.title: White Dishwasher Basket by Better Houseware I purchased for some miscellaneous small kitchen items ...
customer_reviews.text: White Dishwasher Basket by Better Houseware I purchased for some miscellaneous small kitchen items like small ball container lids. it will stand up on my top rack where no dishwaasher supporting rods poke through the basket. The lid closes tight and the rubber coating is thicker around the basket rim and lid than the basket itself. It will most likely wear where the lid is pinched closed....we shall see how it holds up over time and use. So I like it so far....comes in handy for a few odd shaped items....I like it .
customer_reviews.author: BM33TX

customer_reviews.title: You definitely can do better, keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this looking to replace one I had that disappeared during a move. It's not bad, but it's not one I would have bought if I'd looked at it in person. The top section is so loose that it barely stays closed. I always wedge it up next to something to make certain it will stay closed while in the dishwasher. I will keep this only until I can find a better one -- one I will be buying in a store where I can make sure it's well made. Bottom line: Save your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: EMSinVA

customer_reviews.title: I like that the lid fits snugly because then I know ...
customer_reviews.text: As some reviewers have mentioned it is slightly difficult to get the basket open, however and at least for me, this is not an issue that has affected the performance of the product. I like that the lid fits snugly because then I know for certain it isn't going to pop open and my items aren't going to flying all over the inside of the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: MLynn

customer_reviews.title: Just the right shape
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace one that I had for about 20 years. I used to use it for baby things, but now I use it all the time for plastic measuring spoons, coffee mug lids, and other plastic things. I like that it is not as long or tall as what I see now for baby items. So glad they still make this.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen R.

customer_reviews.title: Best basket for your Dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: We've had 2 of these for many years but the coating was peeling off with each use, so we replaced them. The are great for small/light items that'd fly around in the dishwasher. They "snap" shut so no worries about them opening up.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Rahm

customer_reviews.title: Missed Opportunity
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this very sturdy, durable basket has only one design flaw; which became evident the one and only time I used it. All four corners are an open slot, through which two smallish plastic lids slipped and fell to the bottom of the dishwasher! Otherwise I could have had a long lasting relationship with!
customer_reviews.author: 4GirlsGrammy

customer_reviews.title: Basket coating cracked and rusted
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar basket that I used while my kids were young and it lasted 20 years before any of the outer plastic coating split and rusted. This one is only 8 months old and is cracked and rusted. Not good quality. Do not buy. The positive feedback must be from those who haven't had the product long enough to see that it doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Kauby

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better!
customer_reviews.text: IT is okay, I mainly don't like that the corners have openings that my small lids fit though and come out in the dishwasher. I like the size over all a lot! We take salad to work and we needed something to wash the small dressing containers in. We will use it but wish the design had a wire around the corners, I was thinking about using zip ties to close off the corner. We will see.....
customer_reviews.author: Stampy

customer_reviews.title: Great little basket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wash my reusable plastic ice cubes in the dishwasher. It is the perfect size and does exactly what I need it to. Holds quite a bit for its size.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR LIDS & SPATULAS!
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for those plastic lids that come with smoothie glasses. I also place some of my thinner silicone spatulas in this so they won't fall to the bottom of the dishwasher. This is plastic-coated metal and quite sturdy. I simply move the lid to the side to allow a thicker plastic lid to fit on edge.
customer_reviews.author: Cascade

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these years ago to wash baby bottle nipples and it worked very well. Lost track of it when we left that phase behind, but thought of it again recently when I wanted something to wash my reusable k-cups, so bought another one. It works great! I just load them in there and set it in the top rack of my dishwasher. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dominopersson

customer_reviews.title: Yes and Yes
customer_reviews.text: Fits easily in my dishwasher, easily removed when needed and retains the smaller items well. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Major flaw in design
customer_reviews.text: This could have been the most handy basket yet. Sturdy built but MAJOR FLAWED CONCEPT. The slats are so big almost everything falls right though. Absolutely useless, poor design on the stupidity part.
customer_reviews.author: Poppinfresh

customer_reviews.title: Started rusting almost immediately  - keep looking
customer_reviews.text: This basket is entirely a piece of garbage. I used it for under a month and it began rusting. Considering it is advertised to use for baby bottles etc, I would never use it for that purpose given that it begins rusting right away. Not good quality and money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Great idea! Wish I had thought about it!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of looking for small items on the bottom of my dishwasher, this is a wonderful solution! I use it when I need it, and remove it when I don't.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: most useful item
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful for small items in the dishwasher. I needed a replacement for the one I had before ( after 20 yrs. it has worn in several places). I was not able to find it locally so was thrilled to find it here and it is just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Kay

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Does take up much room in the washer. Love the it fits in rack and allows the dishwasher rack spooks to come thru so I can still stand some of the tiny lids up inside the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Vaszlavik

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but a bit hard to open
customer_reviews.text: This basket is sturdy and large, so you can put a variety of small items in it. You can place it on end to save space. The latch is very tight. That's much better than if it were loose, but the first few times it can be a challenge to open it without feeling like everything in it is going to go flying. After a while, you learn how to hold it (one hand around the bottom of the basket and the other thumb on the latch) in order to open it smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: TomF

customer_reviews.title: Different but Better Than Original
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday but it seems to be just what I needed to replace the mesh bag that came with my dishwasher for small items. This will be great for K-cup parts, corn cob holders, small Tupperware lids, etc. Very sturdy and much better price than ordering another mesh bag that did not last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Prisiris

customer_reviews.title: A cross bar on the corners would be nice.
customer_reviews.text: It’s just the size I needed for some small lids. Unfortunately, I didn’t look close enough to see that there is no cross bar at the corners and the lids can slide out easily. I’ll keep it for larger items, but it’s back to the drawing board for something for lids.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: ❤️❤️❤️Best Thing  ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best one of the best gadgets I have purchased this year!!! Fits all kinds of little things that would otherwise be eaten by dishwasher. Fits on top or bottom shelf with ease. Extremely strong.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Surprised the lid didn't stay closed.
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these to zip tie to the bottom of my crab traps to hold the bait. They worked like a dream except that apparently the crab can get them open. I fixed that by zip tieing the lid closed as well. No problems after that. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small items!
customer_reviews.text: The 'Dishwasher Basket' gives peace of mind for washing small items on top rack of dishwasher. No more worries of damaging dishwasher because of small pieces jamming and causing havoc.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara P

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last due to rust
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this twice and it’s already separated at two points and starting to rust. Looks like the metal isn’t welded at that point so just opening the lid splits the rubber coating and allows for rust. I don’t like plastic baskets which is why I went with this one... other than that I like it fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: it's great for washing tops to jars and small items like that. The only problem I found is that sometimes getting the top open is sometimes difficult. But I do think it will loosen up with wear. I do use it every day; and leave it in the dishwasher all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Super smal
customer_reviews.text: Runs SUPER small. Save yourself the hassle and just buy the baby dishwasher baskets from Munchkin. They’re double the size of this one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: It’s sturdy and is taller than my normal holder. The only downside is it’s kind of small and doesn’t hold everything so I need 2.
customer_reviews.author: GypsyFeet

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I wish it was a little bigger, but I can fit a lot of bottle nipples and parts in here. it did start to rust pretty quickly but nothin to be too worried about or to make us stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan kessler

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a few months
customer_reviews.text: Rusted through after only 5 months of use. Totally useless now. Get a plastic basket. The last plastic dishwasher basket I had lasted for 14 years.
customer_reviews.author: Crusty

customer_reviews.title: WORKS OKAY EXCEPT THAT IT LATCHES TOO TIGHTLY AND IS TOO HARD TO OPEN
customer_reviews.text: This can hold small items and go through the dishwasher. I bought one in the past, years ago. However, the one I recently purchased latches too tightly and is very hard to open because it latches too tightly. I find myself avoiding it when I can.
customer_reviews.author: C's PurchasesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: What should have been included
customer_reviews.text: This should have been included in your dishwasher when you bought it. There are a myriad of things that are just a bit too small for the top rack of your dishwasher. This solves that problem.
customer_reviews.author: SteveF

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this for over a year for small items that don’t normally fit on a dishwasher rack. A little clunky and hard to close but does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke B.

customer_reviews.title: Already owned one but needed this for new home
customer_reviews.text: This basket is the best for organizing while cleaning small items such as wine stoppers, olive oil container stoppers, chop stick rests, etc., anything that needs to be thoroughly cleaned but is too small to be in a dishwasher's main compartment or flatware (silverware) holder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Found one .. !!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these several years ago and it was so handy. Somehow, I lost it, perhaps in a move. It is perfect for those little things that go in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Scribblealf

customer_reviews.title: So Handy
customer_reviews.text: This little basket is the perfect size for those little things that are too small to put loose in the dishwasher. It nestles easily in the top rack, where more delicate items would go anyway. The lid might have been a little tight at first, but you just need to bend it up slightly with a pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Catten

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Use this to clean small items & to clean rocks in the dishwasher to use in dish gardens. Very sturdy, closes securely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: corroded and falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product. Have had it for about 4 months and its already corroded and rusted and totally falling apart! very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Auntie rocks

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby bottle parts in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: Had one on these 28 years ago when my kids were babies. Now have a granddaughter so I will use this in the dishwasher to sterilize the baby bottle parts. The coating will eventually come off with multiple uses, (at least this happened on the one from 28 years ago), but for the price I can buy more than one per year, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Have a dishwasher?  You need this.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little basket. Perfect for little odds and ends that you can’t just throw in the dish washer. Fits great, works great.
customer_reviews.author: merricksmom

customer_reviews.title: This is great for washing lids, funnel cups, tablespoons and other items.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for washing lids, funnel cups, tablespoons and other items. Teaspoons fall through. This keeps me from having to hand wash so many things. I am thrilled I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for washing the small pieces of my coffee cup lid!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. I needed something to wash small, light weight items in so that they wouldn’t fly to the bottom of the dishwasher and possibly melt. Now I’m able to take apart the pieces of my travel coffee cup and wash them on the top rack in this container.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: It is already starting to rust. I didn’t even last half a year. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth I Olafsdottir

customer_reviews.title: Rusting
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for about 5 months. I run the dishwasher every other day and the plastic coating is already cracked and the metal underneath is rusting.
customer_reviews.author: Nydia Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This item rusted after only a few months of use. Not a good value. It went in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Basket started to rust after six months
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a good product at first. Bought it to wash medical breathing parts each night. Only on top rack of dishwasher. Worked well until some brown stuff showed up on side. Examination showed plastic/vinyl had split open and underlying wire frame was rusting. Will replace with an all plastic model. Summary: not a durable item for daily dishwasher use.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain man

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to hold little items in the dishwasher, and I didn't want the kind made for baby bottle items, because I didn't want the dividers -- just a basket. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela19

customer_reviews.title: This is an extremely useful item !
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for keeping small items safe in the Dishwasher. I have used the, for several years, this is my forth one. the only thing I dislike about the dishwasher basket is that the coating does ware off in time leaving metal that will rust over time. Tho this fact has never stopped me from reordering and continuing to use the Dishwasher basket. thanks for a very handy item.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Welker

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted all but the size. Looks bigger on here and it was a lot smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Warchol

customer_reviews.title: Great unless you use it.
customer_reviews.text: Approximately 20 washes and it is now rusty on the bottom. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Schamel

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: After one year, the white rubber/vinyl coating started peeling off and the rusty metal frame is poking through
customer_reviews.author: New Jersey Guy

customer_reviews.title: New Chick Hatch Baskets!
customer_reviews.text: Non-traditional use but boy do they work well. I use these baskets in my incubators as hatch baskets and other than having to add a small strip of tape in the corners so chicks don't get their heads stuck they work really, really well.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S. Watson

customer_reviews.title: STAY Away do NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: AFTER 2-3 MTHS TURNED INTO A PILE OF RUST((( AWFUL!
customer_reviews.author: joyous1

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher basket
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for anything small needing to be washed in the dishwasher! Exactly what I was looking for! Highly recommend. Very sturdy product. A+!
customer_reviews.author: subarulove

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great for small items in the dishwasher on the top rack.
customer_reviews.author: Petry1234

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Purchase mainly for my reusable k-cup pods. It's nice and compact and does not take up valuable dishwasher space
customer_reviews.author: S. Martins

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help manage small things in the dish washer, which it does well.
customer_reviews.author: MWM

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect if you have small items that can get lost in your dishwasher. Great price and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Risberg

customer_reviews.title: Like all man made things, it will wear out.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we have had, the first one lasted for over five years, with daily use. I expect the same from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest R. Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this basket Oc 22, 2019 and now 2 months later all the plastic Coating has cracked. It is now pealing off the wire.
customer_reviews.author: Movie buff

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Keep it in top of the dishwasher. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Simerly

customer_reviews.title: Peeled and rusting
customer_reviews.text: I had to throw this out after just four months in the dishwasher (two runs a week). The plastic had peeled and the metal was rusting, maybe from the heat of the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rusted
customer_reviews.text: Cracked & rusted within 4 months... kept Using it but got worse & worse. At first thought it was just whst I needed but now throwing it out after just having it 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy little helper.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if I would like it as it is on the small side. But that turned out to be the best feature for me. It wouldnt work for very tiny things but it works great for sippy cup lids and mason jar lids. It is very sturdy and has held up well. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this little basket, no more having to search the bottom of the dishwasher for small caps or lids, small food processor blades or butter spreaders!
customer_reviews.author: GoodJuJu

customer_reviews.title: They work well
customer_reviews.text: I use this to wash 🧼 my small salad dressing holders
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Luce

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable Caddy!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this caddy. Looked everywhere to replace the one I've had for more than a decade when the coating began to peel away. Waited to long to head to Amazon, and voila found the exact match. Hopefully this one will last 10 years too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this basket to use in my dishwasher when cleaning the small parts associated with the motor on my pet drinking fountain. The basket is the correct size for the top shelf but occasionally the small parts fall through the basket openings and fall into the bottom of the dishwasher. Since I don't want to loose these parts or have them get caught in the dishwasher, I probably won't continue to use the basket for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Manney

customer_reviews.title: Overall good performance
customer_reviews.text: The basket fits perfectly on the top rack of the dishwasher. The first time I used the basket one small lid fell out through a corner hole. I had to add a small tie wrap on all four corners to close the gap. After 3-1/2 months of use, the white coating has cracked and rust is exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: The basket started chipping away and falling apart after about 4 months of use. It just keeps getting worse, and it worries me that pieces of it are ending up in my bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Grabeck

customer_reviews.title: Rusted out! Is it just me?
customer_reviews.text: Mine rusted out all across the bottom, in just 6 months! I have been getting great use out of it. Just don't know why this has happened.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rutter

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This product keeps all my little kitchen things from having to be hand washed. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B Munn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little basket for the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little basket for the dishwasher. I had to use twist ties on the corners to prevent some smaller items from slipping out. The middle bar should wrap around the entire box instead of just the sides. That said, love the box.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie P.

customer_reviews.title: CPAP Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Placed CPAP mask parts in Dishwasher basket and put it on top shelf of dishwasher for periodic cleaning. Can't speak to durability as I have only had it a short while.
customer_reviews.author: Vrek

customer_reviews.title: Cracked in two months.
customer_reviews.text: This basket worked as expected until the coating started cracking within the first two months. I'm disappointed and will have to search for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Blugtr

customer_reviews.title: Holds up great and works great
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year and use it almost every load in the dishwasher. Holds up great and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As of 8/1/18 this basket rusted in several places. I had to throw it out. To say the least I am not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bk

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what I need it to do. Hold small things in the dishwasher. I havent had it long but it has been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: I love the dishwasher basket for small items. Hadn't seen one in years, and was delighted to find this one. Exactly as I remember them, and every bit as useful. Service and delivery were also excellent, and the basket arrived on the date given. Totally satisfied with the seller and the product.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: perfect for small items
customer_reviews.text: Good Product! Happy with purchase. Fits easily in my dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Travelin' Lady

customer_reviews.title: Get the cage man!
customer_reviews.text: Yes. Yes. Yes. No more measuring cups or dip cups flying all over my dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Sara B.

customer_reviews.title: It’s handy.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for little items like corn cob holders.
customer_reviews.author: XAP90

customer_reviews.title: Every dishwasher should have one of these
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our soda stream bottle lids and a few other small things that would fly around in the dishwasher otherwise. It works great. Really happy that we have it.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Didn’t even last a year before all the plastic was peeling off and rusted out.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy m

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: this rusted after only a few uses, now I'm looking for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Michel

customer_reviews.title: The manufacturing feels solid as well-- quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Narrow items can fall through the corners. Otherwise it's well designed. The manufacturing feels solid as well-- quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Fits in top rack of dishwasher perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs. It fits great. Holds our small items, such as bottle tops etc...
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D.

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: This is after 10 months of use. The dividers that were on the inside are completely gone, presumably melted somewhere inside my dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Samberjack

customer_reviews.title: Replacing one just like it.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find this product on-line. I had tried two other types but they didn't compare to this one. This new one was harder to open than my first one but my husband bent the opener just a bit and now it's perfect. I use it for pet food lids and measuring spoons, mostly.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for corn cob holders and other small objects that ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for corn cob holders and other small objects that I prefer in the dishwasher instead of washing by hand.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: This is great in the dishwasher for my reusable coffee pods!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Emerick

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected, don't plan on fitting muck in here and there are no spikes to place things between either it is just a small wire box. You could probably;y fit one soda can inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T.

customer_reviews.title: this works great for my nebulizer small parts
customer_reviews.text: this works great for my nebulizer small parts, which can be dishwasher safe 1 time a week and to keep the cats from playing when hand washed. I only had 1 problem the corners were a bit to wide but fixed them with small security ties...
customer_reviews.author: Jackson's Mom

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little device to have for your dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little device to have for your dishwasher. You know that those small items are not going to disappear down the drain. This replaced my old basket that I had for YEARS. Well worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I could find another just like it

product_meta.title: White Dishwasher Basket by Better Houseware
product_meta.description: This invaluable Dishwasher Basket keeps small parts and accessories safe while machine washing. Great for any small parts from lids and pacifiers to corn holders and small utensils. Simply place the basket on your dishwasher's shelf and safely wash your small items. The lid snaps shut to keep items contained.
